About.Contenido: Recently graduated from the Software Development program. During my time at the institution, I have worked on small Full Stack projects both within my institute and independently. I am characterized by being an organized, responsible, and creative individual. I have a strong passion for learning new technologies and taking on new challenges in the field of development.
